text.section:
The raw milk that a milk producer sells shall be raw milk that:
Is obtained by the complete milking of a healthy cow or goat;
Is unadulterated, whole, and unadjusted; and
Is practically free of colostrum.

The pasteurized milk products that a distributor, bobtailer, or milk processor sells shall:
Be pasteurized; and
Meet all definitions and standards of identity established by federal law and regulation.
